author: jimmygchen
content:
Friendly reminder PeerDAS breakout call is at 10am UTC today (https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1295), would be helpful if any EL devs can join and discuss the change to move proof computation to the tx sender, context:
https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/745077610685661265/1340931845239341087
